searchUrl.title: Search URL (Optional)
searchUrl.description: Direct Computrabajo search URL to scrape. If provided, other search parameters will be ignored. Example: https://ar.computrabajo.com/empleos-de-administracion-y-oficina

country.title: Country
country.description: Select the Computrabajo country domain to scrape from

searchQuery.title: Search Query / Category
searchQuery.description: Job category or keywords to search for (e.g., 'administracion-y-oficina', 'tecnologia-sistemas', 'ventas'). This will be used in the URL path.

location.title: City/Location (Optional)
location.description: Specific city or location within the country (optional). Leave empty for nationwide search.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape (0 = unlimited). Default is 50 for optimal performance.

includeFullDescription.title: Include Full Descriptions
includeFullDescription.description: Fetch complete job descriptions from detail pages (slower but more comprehensive)

jobType.title: Job Type (Optional)
jobType.description: Filter by employment type if supported

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Residential proxies recommended for Computrabajo.
